alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 2:36PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Collier and south central Hendry Counties through 315 PM EST... At 236 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ave Maria to near Cape Romano. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marco Island, Ave Maria, Chokoloskee, Everglades City, Golden Gate Estates, Plantation Island, Carnestown, Cape Romano, Marco Island Airport, Copeland, Hendry Correctional, Royal Palm Hammock, Big Cypress National Preserve, South Blocks Golde, Sunniland, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Picayune Strand State Forest, Port Of The Island, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, and Miles City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County
